title: New free champion rotation: Aatrox, Annie, Kalista and more!

replies.body:
**A Corporate Matter: Episode 31.**

{{champion:150}} "I'm so bored."

{{champion:16}} "Why is that?"

{{champion:150}} "Gentleman kog'maw is off doing who knows what, and i kinda liked him here. But don't tell him i said that. I already did all my work today. So now i am just bored."

{{champion:16}} "Why don't you come on a walk with me. I know this beautiful path by the pond."

{{champion:150}} "You mean, leave here and go to the _outernet_?"
_"Shudders"_

{{champion:16}} "Yeah, it will be fun."

{{champion:150}} "Wow, i really am desperate. Ok, lets go."

**_A little while later:_**

{{champion:150}} "Jeez, its cold out here."

{{champion:16}} "Come on you big baby, you have all that fur."

{{champion:150}} "Well its not like. Hey, is that Project: Yasuo?"

{{champion:157}} "Yeah, its me."

{{champion:16}} "What are you doing out here, i thought you were a techno type person, not nature."

{{champion:157}} "Evidently i am too human for the new projects. So, i decided to embrace my identity and be one with nature. I am also doing something that they can't."

{{champion:150}} "And, what is that?"

{{champion:157}} "Getting really, really, really, drunk."
_"Slurp"_

{{champion:16}} "I am supposed to heal all wounds. So, tell me what happened, it should help you.'

{{champion:157}} _"Hiccup"_ "Fine, here is what happened when i first got back to my lair."

**Earlier:**

{{champion:157}} "Who are you people?"

{{champion:114}} "We are the projects."

{{champion:157}} "But, i thought i was an only child?"

{{champion:238}} "Not anymore, bub."

{{champion:157}} "What are you doing in my lair, is that a minion. What have you done to the poor thing. Oh my, **STOP THAT RIGHT NOW!**"

{{champion:236}} "We are upgrading them, for the cause."

{{champion:157}} "Thats not right, they don't even match us. Besides, they don't have any particles. We are all 1350 or above, how can we justify that price with no new particles on the minions."

{{champion:89}} "I also upgraded our spawn effects, now powered by the sun."

{{champion:157}} "I will not stand for this."

{{champion:114}} "Then sit."

{{champion:157}} _"Sigh"_ "I will just get rid of all this when i talk to our creator."

{{champion:236}} "Good luck, he won't be back until October. But yeah, he will probably get rid of these amazing minions and stuff when he gets back."

{{champion:157}} "Alright, now you four need to-"

{{champion:89}} "But there is five of us."

{{champion:157}} "I only see- **HOLY !@#$, WHAT IS THAT MONSTER!!!!!!!**"

{{champion:11}} **"SWORDS, I LIKE SWORDS. LOOK AT ME SWORDS. I GOT A TWO IN ONE SWORD. I'M DARTH MAUL NOOBS, PREPARE TO BE MY QUI GON."**

{{champion:238}} "Yeah, thats our leader. They went a little overboard on him."

{{champion:11}} **"ALL FIVE OF US PROJECTS, RECALL. TIME TO SHOW OFF AND BE THE MOST BROKEN CHAMPIONS WE CAN BE. WITH SWORDS."**

{{champion:157}} "Can i be part of the cool recall animation too? I mean, Leona and Lucian line up back to back for theirs, which is amazing. I wanna join. No, you are just going to leave me. Fine, then i guess i will go and sit in a corner."
_"Sobs"_

_**Back to the present:**_

{{champion:157}} "I didn't want to show them that there is a sword in my boot anyways."

{{champion:16}} "Oh, i am so sorry for you."

{{champion:157}} "Why do they get all the cool stuff. I could have at least gotten an icon. But jokes on them. I heard that Zed went supa cray cray and attacked them all. While Leona just left."

{{champion:150}} "Why can't Fiora get drunk. i mean she has a face and all."

{{champion:16}} "Boss, you can't just ask why someone can't get drunk."

{{champion:157}} "You ever really looked at that face, it ain't human. I don't even think it can move. Its really freaky."

{{champion:150}} "Alright, i think i should go back to someplace inside, all this fresh air is starting to kill me."

{{champion:16}} "The fresh air can't kill you, sir."

{{champion:150}} "Oh yeah? Omen said the same thing, and look how it ended for him."



(Shameless self advertisement. Threadless.com is hosting a t-shirt design contest. And i entered in it. I would be very grateful if you guys could go and give me a good score. 
If you like anything related to The X Files or old video games. Then you might like my shirt. 
Also, if it gets funded, i am supposed to get part of the sales, so that would be really cool.
[Here is the link to it:](http://thrdl.es/~/4W58)
As always, thanks for reading.)
Guys {{champion:150}} cant speak English, so your entire story is invalid.

Its been a while since i had one like you. So let me explain.

This is Corporate Gnar, not normal gnar, think of it like a legendary skin. He speaks full English with a fancy British accent, and is the guy who runs the free rotation.

"Omen said the same thing"
Loooool.
RIP.
{{champion:83}} "If i give you a good score on your t-shirt design can I be free next week?"
NO!
Look at my name
Is it just me, or do some of those difficulty bars need updating?
in my opinion.. the difficulty bar shouldnt b there.. i never understood the whole difficulty idea... always felt like the players should decide who is difficult an who arent..
yeah you can be amazingly good with one champ and suck asss with another
Yes, I'm not playing anything but ranked because I don't want a Max w Ori or a no hp Vlad on my team

{{champion:96}} 57% more OOM
{{champion:25}} 120% less movement
{{champion:61}} 69% more balls
{{champion:80}} 300% more bakers and failed drops
{{champion:27}} 72% more chasing
{{champion:91}} 22% more rakes
{{champion:8}} 13% more first bloods
{{champion:429}} should be 500% more kiting
wasnt Kalista free like 2 weeks ago
28 days ago. This is her 8th time being free. (7 if you don't count the extra week because of her being disabled the first 3 days of her first free week.)
why is she constantly free. Why cant we get a fucking free yorick >.>
Yorick is banned from free week. The reason, i dont know.
I think it's because they're currently remaking him, so it might be another 10 years until he pops up again.
:c

Vladimir really loves Bloody Mary!
...She's his girlfriend...
Yet another week without Gragas being in the rotation.
Can {{champion:126}} be free next week pls rito? its been 4 months since he has been free :(
Well have you ever seen a Yorick in the past melenium
i want jayce{{champion:126}} and {{champion:82}} in the rotation as well
kalista again? woah.. she got no respect. lol

Why does {{champion:67}} , {{champion:429}} , {{champion:222}} , {{champion:42}} , or {{champion:119}} always in the free of the week. Like can there please be one week where the bot lane is not a mirror match? #free{{champion:83}}
There is a champion for at least every role in free week.
You forgot {{champion:22}}
{{champion:106}} PLS MAKE TRUNDLE AS FREE ROTATION ON TUESDAY PLEASEEEEEE!!!!!!
I JUST BOT ANNY RITO PLZ
anine cost 450ip its basically a free champ, unless you were dumb enough to use rp

It's a joke, bro...
I bought the starter bundle when I first started. [: So worth.

I love free rotation. I've made it into kinda a draft game. Play champs on rotation, find ones that you love, buy one before Tuesday lol. I chose someone over {{champion:429}} last time. Here's my chance to play her into "buybuybuy" territory.
balls {{champion:61}} sooooo much BALLS!!! {{champion:61}}
{{champion:134}} Say wut?

ONE DAY {{champion:69}} will be free. At least we got close this time. (Last time, we had both Talon and Cass in the same rotation so I have high hopes for next week.)
Not too fond of anything this week seeing as I either own the champions or just don't really care for them?
{{item:3070}} RIP top lane {{item:3070}}

{{champion:223}} "dam frogalicious jukes"
{{champion:429}} can be in free week again, but {{champion:104}} can't have a fucking cigar?!!
looks like no {{champion:75}} top for me this week -_- {{champion:80}}
Play as rumble and kick his broken ass  {{champion:68}}
Woah. Since when his Pantheon broken?
Jesus. these free champion rotations are so good. What did you do riot? Is this your apology for the juggernauts?
No, ANNNIEEEEEE
